alert.note: Alert for Florence; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 11:12AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Florence and Williamsburg Counties through NOON EDT... At 1112 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hebron, or 10 miles northwest of Kingstree, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Kingstree, Pamplico, Trio, Salters, Hannah, Cades, Indiantown, Gourdin, Hebron, Friendfield, Scranton, Coward, Olanta, Lane, Greeleyville, Central Crossroads, Lake City Community Hospital and Williamsburg Regional Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
